description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 13 January 2021 (RN:20/03608/FULL) which varied condition 1 on planning permission dated 13 December 2018 (RN 17/11106/FULL) for the demolition and redevelopment to provide a building of three basement levels, ground and part five, part six upper floors for use as a hotel (Class C1) with ancillary restaurant, bar and wellness facilities, including  terraces at 4th and 6th floors; plant equipment at 6th floor and roof level and associated works: NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to allow design changes and functionality changes including use of a light coloured brick at ground floor level, the six protruding bays to be black metal framed rather than curved white stone. Amendments to the hotel room layouts to fit with the new building grid; DDA ramp to be installed at the entrance of the lobby on the front frontage; Room keys reduced from 85 to 76; UKPN room size has been increased and lightwells at B1 floor to be infilled ( application made under S73 of the Act )
